title: Entire nation standing with armed forces: Saba Sadiq
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 7 (APP):Parliamentary Secretary for Human Rights, Saba Sadiq on Wednesday said that the whole Pakistani nation was standing shoulder to shoulder with the valiant armed forces.
In a statement, Saba Sadiq said the nation was proud of its armed forces who  had shot down seven Indian drones and five warplanes. “We will never allow anybody to commit violation of our territorial integrity and national solidarity ,” she added.
The parliamentary secretary said that Pakistan was committed to peace with dignity and honour, adding that Pakistan’s  brave armed forces were always ready to respond forcefully to any Indian aggression and misadventure.
